package.name: arabic-transliteration-characters
package.author: Noah C.
package.description: This package contains shortcuts for all of the romanized Arabic letters that typical keyboards do not include.
package.title: Arabic Transliteration Characters

manifest.name: arabic-transliteration-characters
manifest.title: Arabic Transliteration Characters
manifest.description: This package contains shortcuts for all of the romanized Arabic letters that typical keyboards do not include.
manifest.author: Noah C.

packageRepo.readme:
### **Arabic Transliteration Characters**

This package enables a person to type out Arabic transliterations quickly and easily from their keyboard, without having to interrupt their typing.

**Key**

```
ح = ḥ/Ḥ
ص = ṣ/Ṣ
ض = ḍ/Ḍ
ط = ṭ/Ṭ
ظ = ẓ/Ẓ
ع = ʿ
ء = ʾ
ا (Vowel) = ā/Ā
و (Vowel) = ū/Ū
ي (Vowel) = ī/Ī
```

**Substitutions:**

```
:h. → ḥ
:H. → Ḥ
:s. → ṣ
:S. → Ṣ
:d. → ḍ
:D. → Ḍ
:t. → ṭ
:T. → Ṭ
:z. → ẓ
:Z. → Ẓ
:[  → ʿ
:]  → ʾ
:a- → ā
:A- → Ā
:u- → ū
:U- → Ū
:i- → ī
:I- → Ī
```

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
# ARABIC TRANSLITERATION CHARACTERS:

matches:
  # Letter ح
  - trigger: ":h."
    replace: "ḥ"
  - trigger: ":H."
    replace: "Ḥ"

  # Letter ص
  - trigger: ":s."
    replace: "ṣ"
  - trigger: ":S."
    replace: "Ṣ"

  # Letter ض
  - trigger: ":d."
    replace: "ḍ"
  - trigger: ":D."
    replace: "Ḍ"

  # Letter ط
  - trigger: ":t."
    replace: "ṭ"
  - trigger: ":T."
    replace: "Ṭ"

  # Letter ظ
  - trigger: ":z."
    replace: "ẓ"
  - trigger: ":Z."
    replace: "Ẓ"

  # Letter ع
  - trigger: ":["
    replace: "ʿ"

  # Letter ء
  - trigger: ":]"
    replace: "ʾ"

  # Long Vowel ا
  - trigger: ":a-"
    replace: "ā"
  - trigger: ":A-"
    replace: "Ā"

  # Long Vowel و
  - trigger: ":u-"
    replace: "ū"
  - trigger: ":U-"
    replace: "Ū"

  # Long Vowel ي
  - trigger: ":i-"
    replace: "ī"
  - trigger: ":I-"
    replace: "Ī"
